title: tweexy Wearable Nail Polish Holder Ring, Fingernail Painting Tool, Manicure and Pedicure Accessories (Bonbon Pink & Spa Green, 2-Pack)
features: TWO IS BETTER THAN ONE. Whether you’re torn between 2 colors or polishing with a friend, the Tweexy’s nail polish holder 2 pack gives you options. Narrow it down to 2 colors that fit your vibe, or someone else's. The soft silicone tool for nail care is a time saver that makes polishing an easy and mess-free activity.

FITS ANY FINGERS & ALL BOTTLES. The flexible silicone rings on Tweexy’s nail polish accessory won’t squeeze your fingers. Wear the nail polish holder on the hand you're polishing for quick application, and put any size or shape bottle into the top opening. From teenagers to adults, all size hands will be complemented by the fitted design of our nail care accessory.

19 COLORFUL COMBOS. Paired to match or complement, everyone can find their personality in one of these nail care duos. With 19 colorful options to choose from, you can decide by yourself to gift, or choose your favorite pair of Tweexy wearable nail polish holders together.

STOP GIFT-GUESSING. It’s time to take the guessing game out of buying gifts. The Tweexy wearable nail polish holder is made for the professionals and those just learning how to polish. No matter what age, the greatest gifts make life easier and more enjoyable.

LIFETIME GUARANTEE. The nail polish holder ring is virtually indestructible. Tweexy offers a lifetime guarantee to promise this nail polish tool is the one you’ll always come back to. Accessorize and accent your life with a guaranteed life-simplifying nail-care combo package
